high_descs: Move forward to the bed and to the right.
Pick up the green pillow on the bed.
Turn right and bring the pillow to the lamp on the table.
Turn on the lamp on the table.
anns.task_desc: Examine the pillow by the light of the lamp on the table.

high_descs: Move to face the bed with the green pillow on top of it
pick up the green pillow sitting on top of the bed
Carry the green pillow to the wooden desk with the lamp on top of it
Turn on the desk lamp while holding the green pillow
anns.task_desc: Carry a green pillow while turning on a desk lamp

high_descs: Take a step forward the bed in front of you.
Pick up the pillow from the bed.
Turn on the lamp on the table.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow next to the light of a lamp.
